newsitem.title: DENMARK: Moeller China ship order $90 mln - paper.
newsitem.headline: Moeller China ship order $90 mln - paper.

text.p: Danish shipping and oil group A.P.Moeller declined on Friday to comment on a local shipping newspaper report that it was paying some $90 million for a recent order for two product carriers from China.
On Tuesday, Moeller said it had ordered two 110,000 dwt twin-hulled product carriers from China's Dalian New Shipyard at an undisclosed price.
In a statement Moeller said that the new order brought to four the number of such vessels on order from Dalian for delivery in 1999 and 2000.
"The Dalian tanker order costs about $45 million per vessel," the Danish shipping newspaper Soefart said. --Stig Pedersen (45) 33 96 96 59r
